entry.title: Open Design Engine - Bug #34: Running install of ODE seems to be having problems sending status updates
entry.content:
Updated Email Notification Settings (Administration->Settings->Email Notifications) to send emails for more events. Specifically:

    • Issue added
    • Issue updated (and all its sub-events)
    • News added
    • Message added

entry.title: Open Design Engine - Bug #34: Running install of ODE seems to be having problems sending status updates
entry.content:
• Status changed from New to Resolved

Updates to email notification settings corrected the problem.
